Title: BULOVA DIVERS ACCUTRON QUARTZ OCEANOGRAPHER 666 FT N8 1978 RARE ORIGINAL VGC

THE GLASS IS MINT BY THE WAY SEE PHOTOS.RUNNING AND KEEPING A RARE WATCH BUT FAR FROM SURE the condition of the watch it good THE CASE IS IN NICE CONDITION AS WELL  could
Description: For your consideration is a very rare find BULOVA DIVERS ACCUTRON QUARTZ OCEANOGRAPHER 666 FT n8 for1978 runs keeping good time working the crown and secs hand out you have a nice looking 70s watch .I think it is a rare find and it's a 1978 case with lovely dial .The hands are right ones as well this have a bit of patina to them also the markers have a bit of patina as well .The watch is in very good used condition has some marks on the case but not much for a watch made in 1978 has logo on the crown and the bracelet clasp,very nice design on the face and hands hard to show bit like carbon fiber look but it's not . A very hard to find watch now running very keeping time but no seconds hands and lose crown in could be a easy fix was going to go off one day to be fixed but my old watch man has stopped working now so all my old Bulovas that need any work and going up for sale as you know do they are top end watches .The watch looks very cool as it has that cool design case and dial. I love the way the hands and markers are on this watch just so nice by the way .Some sizes for you 36mm case,39mm with logo crown ,40mm lug to lug,12.77mm thick.(Please see condition report just a few marks on clasp and bracelet still a very nice one of these and a rare find now for sure there is one on here for sale not as nice as this imho by a long way and that's £430 +p&p .)This is one for the collectors i think it's a nice design as well.see photos. Starts at 99p so grab a bargain.I HAVE DYSLEXIA SO IT NOT THAT EASY. I TRY MY BEST AND TAKE GOOD PHOTOS TO HELP YOU OUT.THANKS VERY MUCH. To be honest this is a very well made watch and getting hard to find one now, keeping very good time and .
